stories.original_summary: Researchers from New England Biolabs (NEB®) and Yale University describe the first fully synthetic bacteriophage engineering system for Pseudomonas aeruginosa, an antibiotic-resistant bacterium of global concern, in a new PNAS study. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Craft Magical Constructs to Battle Resilient Blight
stories.fantasy_story: From the hallowed halls of the Alchemists' Guild and the Wizards' Academy, wise alchemists have devised a new method. They are crafting tiny magical constructs from scratch to combat a stubborn blight. This powerful enchantment system aims to defeat the most resilient of plagues.

stories.original_headline: Life’s chemistry may begin in the cold darkness of space
stories.original_summary: New experiments reveal that protein precursors can form naturally in deep space under extreme cold and radiation. stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Discover Life's Seeds May Sprout in Cosmic Dust
stories.fantasy_story: Wise sages conducting new experiments have made a wondrous discovery. They found that the basic essences of life can naturally form in the great void, amidst extreme cold and radiant energies. Tiny building blocks of vitality appear on cosmic dust, long before realms and stars exist. This suggests life's earliest magic might begin in the deep darkness of space.

stories.original_headline: DJI’s Mic Mini is a big upgrade over your phone’s mic, and it’s on sale for $60
stories.original_summary: If you want better audio than your phone can deliver while creating content on the go but a high-end wireless mic isn’t in the budget, DJI’s Mic Mini is worth a look. stories.fantasy_headline: Clan Dji Offers Whispering Amulet Bargain for Storytellers!
stories.fantasy_story: The Clan of Dji has presented a grand opportunity for all chroniclers and bards. Their Whispering Amulet, an artifact that captures voices better than any talking crystal, is now available. This magic item will greatly enhance your tales without costing many gold coins, a true bargain for adventurers.

stories.fantasy_headline: Nex Clan Unveils Speaking Stone with Three Magical Spirits!
stories.fantasy_story: The skilled artificers of the Nex Clan have forged a wondrous new artifact: the NexStone. This versatile speaking stone can transform into a grand lore-keeping tome, powered by three distinct magical spirits. It allows travelers to access vast knowledge, offering powerful displays when connected to other enchantments.
